member.name: T:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d
member.summary: Represents a line from three coefficients a, b and c, where ax + by + c = 0 holds.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a new line from three coefficients a, b and c, where ax + by + c = 0 holds.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a new line from the slope and the y intercept, where y = mx + b holds.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.#ctor(CGeom2D.Points.Point2d,CGeom2D.Points.Point2d)
member.summary: Create a new line that passes through the two points.

member.summary: Create a new line that passes through the two points.

member.summary: Find the slope of the line.

member.name: P:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.IsAscending
member.summary: Determines whether the line is ascending (that is, makes an angle with the positive direction of the X axis that lies in (0, pi/2).

member.name: P:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.IsVertical
member.summary: Determines whether the line is vertical (that is, makes an angle with the positive direction of the X axis that is equal to pi/2.

member.name: P:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.IsDescending
member.summary: Determines whether the line is descending (that is, makes an angle with the positive direction of the X axis that lies in (pi/2, pi).

member.name: P:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.IsHorizontal
member.summary: Determines whether the line is horizontal (that is, makes an angle with the positive direction of the X axis that is equal to pi.

member.name: P:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.IsDegenerate
member.summary: Determines whether the line is degenerate (e.g.two equal points were passed to the constructor).

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.X(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the X coordinate of a point on the line by its Y coordinate.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Geometry.Line2d.Y(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the Y coordinate of a point on the line by its X coordinate.

member.name: T:CGeom2D.Numerics.Matrix2x2d
member.summary: Matrix is column major. Data is accessed as: row + (column*2). Matrices can be indexed like 2D arrays but in an expression like mat[a, b], a refers to the row index, while b refers to the column index (note that this is the opposite way round to Cartesian coordinates).

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Numerics.Matrix3x3d.TryInverse(CGeom2D.Numerics.Matrix3x3d@)
member.summary: The Inverse of the matrix copied into mInv. Returns false if the matrix has no inverse. A matrix multipled by its inverse is the idenity. Invert a 3x3 using cofactors. This is about 8 times faster than the Numerical Recipes code which uses Gaussian elimination.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Predicates.IntersectsProper(CGeom2D.Geometry.Segment2i,CGeom2D.Geometry.Segment2i)
member.summary: Returns true if the two segments intersect and are not collinear. Does not handle point on segment cases.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Predicates.Intersects(CGeom2D.Geometry.Segment2i,CGeom2D.Geometry.Segment2i)
member.summary: True if the segments intersect. Handles all edge cases. Collinear segments count as no intersection.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Predicates.Between(CGeom2D.Geometry.Segment2i,CGeom2D.Geometry.Segment2i)
member.summary: True if any end point of the segments are in between the other segment. Point on point is considered between.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Predicates.Between(CGeom2D.Points.Point2i,CGeom2D.Points.Point2i,CGeom2D.Points.Point2i)
member.summary: True if b lies in between the segment ac. b on a or c is considered between.

member.name: M:CGeom2D.Predicates.Xor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: True if only one argument is true.
